metadata.description: Rules to initiate execution of a set of tasks using Agent OS

execute_tasks_protocol.overview:
Execute tasks for a given spec following three distinct phases: 1. Pre-execution setup (Steps 1-3) 2. Task execution loop (Step 4) 3. Post-execution tasks (Step 5)
ALL three phases MUST be completed. Do not stop after phase 2.

phase.name: Pre-Execution Setup

step.name: task_assignment
step.title: Task Assignment
step.description: Identify which tasks to execute from the spec (using spec_srd_reference file path and optional specific_tasks array), defaulting to the next uncompleted parent task if not specified.

implicit.action: Find next uncompleted task in tasks.md

instructions.default: Select next uncompleted parent task if not specified

step.name: context_analysis
step.title: Context Analysis
step.description: Use the context-fetcher subagent to gather minimal context for task understanding by always loading spec tasks.md, and conditionally loading mission-lite.md, spec-lite.md, and technical-spec.md if not already in context.

subagent_invocation.primary:
@context-fetcher, please load: - The spec tasks.md from {{SPEC_PATH}}/tasks.md - Product pitch from @.agent-os/product/mission-lite.md (if exists) - Spec summary from {{SPEC_PATH}}/spec-lite.md (if exists) - Technical approach from {{SPEC_PATH}}/sub-specs/technical-spec.md (if exists)
Return the content and key points from each file found.
subagent_invocation.fallback: @subagent, please load the spec context files listed above.

instructions.action: Use context-fetcher subagent to load context

step.output:
Loading context files... @context-fetcher, please load the spec context files... [Waiting for context-fetcher response...]
âœ“ Context loaded successfully âœ“ Key requirements understood

step.name: git_branch_management
step.title: Git Branch Management
step.description: Use the git-workflow subagent to manage git branches to ensure proper isolation by creating or switching to the appropriate branch for the spec.

instructions.request: Check and manage branch for spec

step.output:
Setting up git branch... @git-workflow, manage branch for spec... [Waiting for git-workflow response...]
âœ“ Branch: {{BRANCH_NAME}} (active) âœ“ Working tree: clean

phase.name: Task Execution Loop

step.name: task_execution_loop
step.title: Task Execution Loop
step.description: Execute all assigned parent tasks and their subtasks using @.agent-os/instructions/core/execute-task.md instructions, continuing until all tasks are complete.
step.important: This is a loop. Execute ALL assigned tasks before proceeding to Phase 3.
step.execution_flow:
LOAD @.agent-os/instructions/core/execute-task.md ONCE
FOR each parent_task assigned in Step 1: EXECUTE instructions from execute-task.md with: - parent_task_number - all associated subtasks WAIT for task completion UPDATE tasks.md status END FOR
**IMPORTANT**: After loop completes, CONTINUE to Phase 3 (Step 5). Do not stop here.
step.task_status_check: AFTER each task execution: CHECK tasks.md for remaining tasks IF all assigned tasks complete: PROCEED to next step ELSE: CONTINUE with next task

instructions.action: Load execute-task.md instructions once at start
instructions.reuse: Same instructions for each parent task iteration
instructions.important: When all tasks complete, proceed to Step 5

phase.phase_gate:

Proceeding to Phase 3: Post-Execution Tasks

phase.name: Post-Execution Tasks

step.name: post_execution_tasks
step.title: Run the task completion steps
step.description: After all tasks in tasks.md have been implemented, use @.agent-os/instructions/core/post-execution-tasks.md to run our series of steps we always run when finishing and delivering a new feature.
step.critical: This step MUST be executed after all tasks are implemented. Do not end the process without completing this phase.

instructions.action: Execute all steps in the post-execution-tasks.md process_flow
instructions.important: This includes: - Running full test suite - Git workflow (commit, push, PR) - Verifying task completion - Updating roadmap (if applicable) - Creating recap document - Generating completion summary - Playing notification sound
